SELECT U.userID writerID, U.nickname writerName, U.pfImagePath pfImagePath, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HEART where HEART.boardNo = B.boardNo) numHeart, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `COMMENT` where `COMMENT`.boardNo = B.boardNo) numComment, B.boardNo boardNo, B.filePath imagePath, B.contents contents, B.regDate regDate FROM `USER` U, `BOARD` B WHERE U.userID = B.userID ORDER BY regDate DESC
LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}

SELECT U.userID commenterID, U.nickname commenterName, U.pfImagePath PfImagePath, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOOD where GOOD.commentNo = C.commentNo) numGood, C.commentNo commentNo, C.contents contents, C.regDate regDate FROM `USER` U, `COMMENT` C WHERE C.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND U.userID = C.writerID ORDER BY regDate DESC;
LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}
